thread.title: Custody Banks Aren’t Flashy, but Their Shares Are

author: Justin Baer
title: Custody Banks Aren’t Flashy, but Their Shares Are

organizations.name: bank of new york mellon corp.

text:
Wall Street’s less glamorous players are suddenly among the hottest stocks in the financial world.
Shares of custody banks State Street Corp. and Northern Trust Corp. hit all-time closing highs this week, and a recent climb by rival Bank of New York Mellon Corp. shares put its record within striking distance.
The three companies have outperformed...
